trans-unit.source: alais_generator. Generates candidate nicknames based on known info about the target. Input: information about the target. Output: list of possible nicknames.
trans-unit.target: alais_generator . Generates candidate nicknames based on known info about the target. Input: information about the target. Output: list of possible nicknames.

trans-unit.source: checkfy. Guesses possible emails based on a list of candidate nicknames and a pattern. Input: list of nicknames and an email pattern. Output. list of emails matching the pattern..
trans-unit.target: checkfy . Guesses possible emails based on a list of candidate nicknames and a pattern. Input: list of nicknames and an email pattern. Output. list of emails matching the pattern..

trans-unit.source: domainfy. Finds domains that currently resolve using a given word or nickname. Input: liat of words. Output: domains using that word that currently resolve.
trans-unit.target: domainfy . Finds domains that currently resolve using a given word or nickname. Input: liat of words. Output: domains using that word that currently resolve.

trans-unit.source: mailfy. Find more information about emails taken as a reference either a nickname (to generate a list of possible emails) or the email list. Input: list of nicknames or emails. Output: found information about the email.
trans-unit.target: mailfy . Find more information about emails taken as a reference either a nickname (to generate a list of possible emails) or the email list. Input: list of nicknames or emails. Output: found information about the email.

trans-unit.source: osrf. Shared wrapper for the rest of the applications. All commands can also be used as osrf usufy…, osrf mailfy…, etc.
trans-unit.target: osrf . Shared wrapper for the rest of the applications. All commands can also be used as osrf usufy… , osrf mailfy… , etc.

trans-unit.source: phonefy. Recovers information about mobile phones linked to known spam practices. Inputs: list of phones. Outputs: Phones linked to spam.
trans-unit.target: phonefy . Recovers information about mobile phones linked to known spam practices. Inputs: list of phones. Outputs: Phones linked to spam.

trans-unit.source: searchfy. Finds profiles linked to a fullname. Inputs: list of phones. Outputs: Known profiles linked to the query.
trans-unit.target: searchfy . Finds profiles linked to a fullname. Inputs: list of phones. Outputs: Known profiles linked to the query.

trans-unit.source: usufy. Identifies socialmedia profiles using a given nickname. Inputs: list of nicknames. Outputs: Known profiles in socialmedia using those nicknames.
trans-unit.target: usufy . Identifies socialmedia profiles using a given nickname. Inputs: list of nicknames. Outputs: Known profiles in socialmedia using those nicknames.

trans-unit.source: Copyright (C) 2014-2020 F. Brezo and Y. Rubio, i3visio
trans-unit.target: Copyright (C)2014-2020 F.Brezo and Y.Rubio,i3visio.

trans-unit.source: Fast way to do it on any system for a user with administration privileges:
trans-unit.target: 对于有管理权限的用户来说,在任何系统上都可以快速完成。

trans-unit.source: For more details on this issue, check the COPYING file.
trans-unit.target: For more details on this issue, check the COPYING file.

trans-unit.source: If everything went correctly (we hope so!), it's time for trying usufy., mailfy and so on. But we are they ? They are installed in your path meaning that you can open a terminal anywhere and typing the name of the program (seems to be an improvement from previous installations...). Examples:
trans-unit.target: 如果一切顺利(我们希望如此!),现在是时候尝试usufy.,mailfy等。但我们是他们?他们被安装在您的路径,这意味着你可以打开一个终端的任何地方,并输入程序的名称(似乎是一个改进,从以前的安装...)。例子:

trans-unit.source: If you are experiencing problems, you might fight relevant information in the (FAQ Section)[doc/FAQ.md].
trans-unit.target: 如果您遇到问题,可以在(FAQ部分)[doc/FAQ.md]中争取相关信息。

trans-unit.source: If you needed further information on how to install OSRFramework on certain systems, note that you may need to add export PATH=$PATH:$HOME/.local/bin to your ~/.bashrc_profile). This has been confirmed in some distributions, including MacOS. In any case, we recommend you yo have a look at the INSTALL.md file where we provide additional details for these cases.
trans-unit.target: If you needed further information on how to install OSRFramework on certain systems, note that you may need to add export PATH=$PATH:$HOME/.local/bin to your ~/.bashrc_profile ). This has been confirmed in some distributions, including MacOS. In any case, we recommend you yo have a look at the INSTALL.md file where we provide additional details for these cases.

trans-unit.source: If you want to extend the functionalities of OSRFramework and you do not know where to start from, check the HACKING.md file.
trans-unit.target: If you want to extend the functionalities of OSRFramework and you do not know where to start from, check the HACKING.md file.

trans-unit.source: More details about the authors in the AUTHORS.md file.
trans-unit.target: More details about the authors in the AUTHORS.md file.

trans-unit.source: OSRFramework
trans-unit.target: OSRFramework

trans-unit.source: OSRFramework - A set of AGPLv3+ OSINT tools developed by i3visio analysts for online research.
trans-unit.target: OSRFramework-由i3visio分析师为在线研究开发的一套AGPLv3+OSINT工具。

trans-unit.source: OSRFramework is a GNU AGPLv3+ set of libraries developed by i3visio to perform Open Source Intelligence collection tasks. They include references to a bunch of different applications related to username checking, DNS lookups, information leaks research, deep web search, regular expressions extraction and many others. At the same time, by means of ad-hoc Maltego transforms, OSRFramework provides a way of making these queries graphically as well as several interfaces to interact with like OSRFConsole or a Web interface.
trans-unit.target: OSRFramework是i3visio开发的一套GNU AGPLv3+库,用于执行开源情报收集任务。它们包含了与用户名检查、DNS查询、信息泄露研究、深度网络搜索、正则表达式提取等相关的一堆不同应用的引用。同时,通过ad-hoc Maltego变换,OSRFramework提供了一种以图形化的方式来进行这些查询,以及几个接口来进行交互,比如OSRFConsole或Web接口。

trans-unit.source: OSRFramework will look for the configuration settings for each application stored there. You can add new credentials there and if something goes wrong, you can always restore the files stored in the defaults subfolder.
trans-unit.target: OSRFramework will look for the configuration settings for each application stored there. You can add new credentials there and if something goes wrong, you can always restore the files stored in the defaults subfolder.

trans-unit.source: OSRFramework: Open Sources Research Framework
trans-unit.target: OSRFramework。开放源研究框架

trans-unit.source: The tools installed in this package include:
trans-unit.target: 本包中安装的工具包括:

trans-unit.source: This is free software, and you are welcome to redistribute it under certain conditions.
trans-unit.target: 这是自由软件,欢迎你在一定条件下重新发布。

trans-unit.source: This will manage all the dependencies for you and install the latest version of the framework.
trans-unit.target: 这将为你管理所有的依赖关系并安装最新版本的框架。

trans-unit.source: Type -h or --help to get more information about which are the parameters of each application.
trans-unit.target: 键入-h或--help以获得更多关于每个应用程序参数的信息。

trans-unit.source: You can find the configuration files in a folder created in your user home to define the default behaviour of the applications:
trans-unit.target: 您可以在用户主页中创建的文件夹中找到配置文件,以定义应用程序的默认行为。

trans-unit.source: You can upgrade to the latest release of the framework with:
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过以下方式升级到框架的最新版本。
